items.question: What services does TOTARO provide?
items.answer: TOTARO provides AI-powered complete B2B export solutions including professional website development, AEO/SEO/GEO optimization, targeted marketing campaigns, and comprehensive buyer management tools to streamline your entire export process.

items.question: How long does website development take?
items.answer: Website development is 90% faster than traditional methods. Our AI automatically generates product catalogs and multilingual landing pages, so you can complete your site quickly without needing professional designers.

items.question: What is AEO/SEO/GEO optimization?
items.answer: AEO optimizes for AI search engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Gemini. SEO optimizes for traditional search engines like Google and Bing. GEO focuses on regional/local targeting. Together, they ensure visibility across AI searches and targeted local markets.

items.question: Which countries and languages do you support?
items.answer: We support 20+ languages and major countries worldwide. We provide customized content and marketing strategies tailored to each region's buyer characteristics and cultural preferences.

items.question: How does the buyer management system work?
items.answer: Our CRM automates buyer communication through lead scoring, automated follow-up sequences, and pipeline management. This eliminates missed follow-ups and improves response time by 85%.

items.question: Can I use TOTARO if I already have a website?
items.answer: Yes, you can either improve your existing website or create a new export-focused website. We also support integration with your existing systems.

items.question: How is pricing determined?
items.answer: We provide customized pricing based on project scope and requirements. You can use individual services (website, optimization, marketing, CRM) or choose our comprehensive package.

items.question: How do you measure results?
items.answer: We measure concrete metrics including inquiry conversion rates, lead response speed, and RFQ request increases. You can monitor progress through our real-time dashboard.
